page.title: 05ALTERNATIVE TRANSPORT
page.content: WE OFTEN SEE MR SMITH DRIVING AROUND THE VILLAGE LANES IN HIS PONY AND TRAP.I VISITED HIM AND ASKED HIM A FEW QUESTIONS.I SAID "WHY DO I SEE YOU OFTEN IN THE PONY AND TRAP"? "BECAUSE I CRASHED MY SONS CAR AND HE WOULDN'T LET ME DRIVE IT AGAIN. YOU SEE IN THE OLDEN DAYS THERE WEREN'T MOTOR BIKES AND CARS. ALL WE HAD WERE HORSES AND CARTS AND PONIES AND TRAPS. THEY DROVE AROUND EASILY AND WE HAD FRESH AIR SO THATS WHY I HAVE ONE. I LIKE TO GO SLOWLY AND HAVE FRESH AIR". "HAVE YOU A PONY FOR IT"? I ASKED." NO BUT I'LL HAVE ONE SOON" HE SAID. "I GO ALONG ROADS AS WELL AS THE LANES. WHEN I COME PAST YOUR HOUSE I WILL COME EARLY AND YOU CAN HAVE A RIDE ROUND SYKEHOUSE AND DOWN THE COUNTRY LANES WITH ME." BY NICOLAS WATSON
